name: Chain Breaker
description:
*Now with more levels and graphic improvements*

This is a small game made for the Mini Jam 87, with the theme of BREAK and the limitation of a PACIFIST PLAYER.

The ball needs to get to the portal. Help it by breaking chains and using physics to achieve that. 

Controls

LMB/Mouse1 on a chain to break it;

Space to jump (only once per level);

R to restart the level you are in;

Escape to open/close the pause menu;
